import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Cart = () => { return (

shopping cart

home / cart

your cart

grand total : $9/-

checkout orders
9 W battery
$3
sub total : $3
multi-pin charger
$3
sub total : $3
classic pack of pens
$3
sub total : $3
delete all

email

abc@gmail.com xyz@gmail.com

opening hours

00:07am to 00:10pm

our address

S.Nedderman Hall-UTA-Arlington-76010

our number

+123-456-7890 +111-222-3333
) } export default Cart
